title: Ford in talks to make EVs in way back to India: Tamil Nadu Industries Minister T.R.B. Rajaa
description: Ford Motor Co. is considering producing electric vehicles at its Tamil Nadu plant in southern India, marking its return to the region after a three-year hiatus. The move aligns with India's plan to enhance EV manufacturing and capitalize on Tamil Nadu's growing status as a hub for electric vehicle production.
